channel.title: Integrations on Plakar | The Open Standard for Backup and Restore
channel.description: Recent content in Integrations on Plakar | The Open Standard for Backup and Restore

item.title: Notion
item.description: Back up and restore your Notion workspace with Plakar.

item.title: Dropbox
item.description: Back up and restore your Dropbox with Plakar, and host Kloset stores in Dropbox.

item.title: iCloud Drive
item.description: Back up and restore your iCloud Drive with Plakar, and host Kloset stores in iCloud Drive.

item.title: Koofr
item.description: Back up and restore your Koofr with Plakar, and host Kloset stores in Koofr.

item.title: Google Drive
item.description: Back up and restore your Google Drive with Plakar, and host Kloset stores in Google Drive.

item.title: OneDrive
item.description: Back up and restore your OneDrive with Plakar, and host Kloset stores in OneDrive.

item.title: OpenDrive
item.description: Back up and restore OpenDrive data with Plakar, and host Kloset stores in OpenDrive.

item.title: Proton Drive
item.description: Back up and restore your Proton Drive with Plakar, and host Kloset stores in Proton Drive.

item.title: MinIO
item.description: Back up and restore MinIO buckets using the S3-compatible API, and host Kloset stores in MinIO object storage.

item.title: SFTP / SSH
item.description: Back up and restore remote directories over SFTP/SSH, and host Kloset stores on remote SFTP servers.
